text: Heartkill is Norwegian singer Tone Damli's first extended play. The EP was released on 20 January 2014. ==Track listing== # "Heartkill" - 3:23 # "Winner of a Losing Game" - 3:50 # "Perfect World" - 3:23 # "Smash" - 3:33 # "Hello Goodbye" (featuring Erik Segerstedt) \- 3:09 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2014/15) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- !scope="row"| Norwegian Albums Chart | style="text-align:center;"| 9 |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Country ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label |- ! scope="row"| Worldwide | 20 January 2014iTunes - Music - Heartkill (EP) by Tone Damli | CD single, digital download | Eccentric Music |} ==References== Category:2014 EPs Category:Tone Damli albums
title: Heartkill
